title: 'Runway in sight' ... then flames: How Ajit Pawar's jet went down - sequence of events
content: Maharashtra deputy chief minister Ajit Pawar's aircraft crashed near Baramati airport shortly after being cleared to land, killing all five on board. The aircraft, registered VI-SSK, had initiated a go-around earlier due to the runway not being in sight. Flames were observed near the runway threshold moments after the landing clearance.

title: 'Hey Pak, don't come, you'll be thrashed': India World Cup-winner warns Mohsin Naqvi
content: Former India opener Krishnamachari Srikkanth has urged Pakistan to skip the T20 World Cup after PCB chief Mohsin Naqvi hinted at a potential withdrawal. Naqvi's remarks, made in solidarity with Bangladesh, drew a sharp response from Srikkanth, who warned Pakistan they would be comprehensively thrashed if they toured India.

title: What Flightradar data tells about Ajit Pawar plane crash in Baramati: The aircraft was attempting…
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others died when their business jet crashed during a second landing attempt at Baramati airfield. The Bombardier Learjet 45XR, operating from Mumbai, struggled with visibility despite manageable meteorological conditions. The DGCA reported the crew lost sight of the runway multiple times before the fatal crash.

title: Blink and miss: Why cycling is ‘one of the hardest sports’ to commentate
content: Blink, and the race is gone. That’s the unique challenge of cycle racing, for spectators and commentators alike. At the Pune Grand Tour, India’s first UCI 2.2 event, commentators Ned Boulting and Graham Jones spoke about the complexities of cycling and the arduous task of talking about it to the viewers.

title: Ajit Pawar killed in Baramati plane crash — Who else was on board
content: A chartered Learjet 45 crashed at Baramati airport on Wednesday morning. Maharashtra deputy chief minister Ajit Pawar was among the five people on board who died. The flight had departed Mumbai earlier. It lost control during landing and caught fire. Investigations into the cause are underway. The victims included Pawar's security officer, an aircraft attendant, and the pilots.

title: As Amazon layoffs loom; calendar invite worries employees due to subject line
content: An accidental internal calendar invite titled 'Send Project Dawn email' rattled Amazon employees, fueling speculation about impending corporate layoffs. The invite, linked to efficiency improvements, hinted that notifications for impacted employees in the US, Canada, and Costa Rica had already been completed, confirming ongoing job cuts.

title: No mayday call, runway not visible: DGCA reveals what went wrong on Ajit Pawar’s last flight
content: Pilots struggled to see the runway during a second landing attempt at Baramati before a fatal crash that killed Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others. The Learjet 45 aircraft, operated by VSR Ventures, made a go-around due to poor visibility. No Mayday call was issued by the crew.

title: Bangladesh-born team owner Tamim Rahman gets sentenced in match-fixing case
content: A Sri Lankan court handed a suspended prison sentence to Tamim Rahman, owner of the Dambulla Thunders, for match-fixing. Rahman, a British national, admitted to attempting to influence a player and arranging bets during the domestic T20 league. He received a four-year jail term, suspended for five years, and a hefty fine.

title: Nvidia gets China's clearance: Beijeing clears Nvidia H200 AI chips; more companies await next round
content: China has greenlit its first import of Nvidia's powerful H200 AI chips, signaling a policy shift. This move aims to balance domestic AI development with fostering local chip production.  The initial batch, reportedly hundreds of thousands, goes to major internet firms, with others awaiting approval. This comes amid strong demand and US clearance for sales.

title: India-EU FTA: Why is the trade deal significant? Explained in 5 charts
content: India and the European Union have finalized a Free Trade Agreement. This pact will progressively lower tariffs on most goods. Indian consumers will see lower prices on items like chocolates and cars. Indian exporters will gain duty-free access to the EU market. The agreement also covers services and intellectual property rights.

title: Watch: Russian soldiers tied half naked to trees, forced to eat snow as punishment
content: Two Russian soldiers accused of desertion and disobeying orders were reportedly punished by being tied to a tree and forced to eat snow in freezing temperatures. The footage emerged amid ongoing peace talks, with Russia demanding territorial concessions from Ukraine, which Kyiv has rejected.

title: Ajit Pawar dies in plane crash: Who were the pilots in NCP chief's last flight?
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others died when a chartered Learjet 45 crash-landed at Baramati airport on Tuesday morning. The aircraft lost control during landing, striking the runway and catching fire. Investigations into the cause are underway, with weather conditions reported as good.

title: 'Border 2' box office collection day 6: Sunny Deol film touches Rs 200 cr in India
content: Border 2 has achieved a significant milestone crossing the Rs 200 crore mark. The film enjoyed a successful four-day extended weekend, boosted by its patriotic theme and Republic Day release. Opening with Rs 30 crore, it saw substantial growth, especially on Sunday and Monday, earning over Rs 50 crore on each of those days.

title: Peaking on time: India flex T20 WC muscle as SKY storms back into ICC top 10
content: India's T20 World Cup preparations are bolstered as captain Suryakumar Yadav re-enters the top 10 batting rankings. He joins Abhishek Sharma and Tilak Varma, giving India three batters in the elite group. Several other Indian players also saw significant jumps in the rankings, showcasing the team's strong batting depth ahead of the global tournament.

title: 4-lane MMR bridge near Mumbai suddenly narrows to 2; MMRDA denies design flaw
content: The recent construction of a Mira-Bhayander flyover is stirring controversy among local residents, who are voicing their frustrations over the unexpected reduction from four lanes to two. Many commuters are worried this change will exacerbate traffic congestion.

title: ‘Animals in a zoo’: Players unite against privacy invasion at Australian Open
content: Coco Gauff's post-match frustration at the Australian Open has ignited a unified player protest against perceived invasions of privacy.  Players, including Serena Williams and Iga Swiatek, are speaking out against constant off-court surveillance, likening it to being "animals in the zoo" and emphasising the need for personal space away from public view.

title: Ajit Pawar plane crash: Riteish Deshmukh, Sanjay Dutt, Anupam Kher, Shilpa Shetty condole
content: On Wednesday, January 28, 2026, the Indian film industry joined the nation in mourning the sudden and tragic demise of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar. The senior NCP leader, along with four others, was killed when their charter aircraft crashed and burst into flames during a landing attempt at Baramati Airport in Pune district. Riteish Deshmukh, Sanjay Dutt, Anupam Kher, Shilpa Shetty, Madhur Bhandarkar, Shatrughan Sinha took to their social media handles to pay their respects.

title: 'Was willing to leave BJP': Mamata floats conspiracy theory on Ajit Pawar's death
content: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee alleged a political conspiracy behind the death of Maharashtra Deputy CM Ajit Pawar in a plane crash. She demanded a Supreme Court-supervised probe, citing reports that Pawar was planning to rejoin his uncle Sharad Pawar's party. BJP MP Kangana Ranaut criticized Banerjee's statement as "petty" during a time of mourning.

title: Secretly recorded calls between spouses admissible in divorce cases: SC - what it means
content: The Supreme Court reversed the decision of Punjab and Haryana High Court and reinstated the order of Family Court authorizing the recordings to be recorded.

title: Ball of fire, smoke, and chaos: CCTV reveals final moments of Ajit Pawar’s ill-fated plane — Video
content: A chartered Learjet 45 carrying Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar exploded during an emergency landing attempt at Baramati airport, killing all five on board. CCTV footage captured the devastating sequence of events, with eyewitnesses describing intense flames and multiple explosions. A detailed probe by aviation authorities is underway to determine the cause of the crash.

title: ‘I was on my way home’: ‘Extremely lucky’ Djokovic survives scare to reach Aus Open semis
content: Novak Djokovic narrowly avoided an Australian Open exit after opponent Lorenzo Musetti retired injured while leading by two sets.  Djokovic, admitting immense luck, was outplayed before Musetti's thigh issue forced his withdrawal. This dramatic turn keeps Djokovic's record 25th Grand Slam pursuit alive and marks his 103rd Melbourne win, surpassing Federer.

title: Air tragedies: From Sanjay Gandhi to Ajit Pawar - Prominent Indians who died in plane crashes
content: Maharashtra deputy chief minister Ajit Pawar tragically died in a plane crash in Baramati, adding to a grim list of Indian leaders lost in aviation accidents. This incident follows the June 2025 crash of an Air India Dreamliner, which claimed the life of former Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani and over 200 others.

title: What is artisanal craftsmanship, and why it is making a comeback in Indian homes
content: Indian homes are embracing artisanal craftsmanship. This trend brings back handcrafted details like carved wood and lime plaster. It offers homeowners uniqueness and a connection to materials. Developers are also opting for these elements. This approach emphasizes sustainability and a new definition of luxury. It creates spaces with depth and personality.

title: Inside the Chamba tragedy that left a pitbull guarding 2 bodies in snow for 4 days
content: A loyal pitbull named Jonu stood guard for four days over his deceased young owners, Viksit and Piyush, who tragically froze to death in Himachal's Chamba district. Rescuers found the brave dog refusing to leave their side. The cousins, aspiring vloggers, ventured into treacherous snow-laden mountains for content, leading to their fatal trek.

title: Andhra woman says Jana Sena MLA Arava Sridhar sexually exploited her
content: A woman has accused Jana Sena MLA Arava Sridhar of sexual exploitation and cheating in a viral video. She claims the legislator threatened her for over a year, demanding she divorce her husband and pressured her into physical exploitation, leading to a forced abortion. The MLA allegedly threatened her husband when she refused his demands.

title: 'Exploded multiple times': Eyewitnesses recall Baramati crash horror that killed Ajit Pawar
content: Tragedy struck Baramati airport as a chartered aircraft carrying Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar crashed during an emergency landing, claiming all five lives aboard. Eyewitnesses described a fiery explosion shortly after the plane hit the ground. The Learjet 45 was en route to a public rally. Investigations are underway to determine the cause of the devastating incident.

title: Ajit Pawar dies in plane crash: VSR Aviation’s Learjet had met with landing mishap in 2023 too
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar died in a crash of a Learjet 45 XR aircraft near Baramati runway on Wednesday. This is the second accident involving a VSR Ventures-owned jet in Maharashtra within two and a half years. The aircraft burst into flames upon crashing, with no survivors reported among the five on board.

title: ‘Delighted to address Parliament’: President Murmu sets tone for Budget Session
content: President Murmu, addressing Parliament, unveiled the government's vision for social justice, inclusive growth, and national security. She highlighted poverty reduction, expanded social security, and a decisive stance against terrorism, citing Operation Sindoor. The President also emphasized economic reforms, infrastructure development, and India's space achievements, including astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla's ISS visit.

title: 'Attacked her with knife': How suspicion over relationship led to HR manager's beheading
content: An HR manager in Agra was allegedly beheaded and dismembered by her lover after an argument over her contact with another man. The accused attempted to dispose of the body parts in the Yamuna River but fled when noticed by passersby. He later confessed to the crime after being arrested.

title: ‘Non-inclusionary’ caste definition: SC to hear plea against UGC’s equity regulations
content: The Supreme Court will hear a plea challenging new UGC regulations on higher education equity. Critics argue the rules define caste discrimination too narrowly, excluding potential bias against general category students. The regulations mandate equity committees with representation from SC, ST, and OBC communities, replacing older advisory guidelines. Protests have erupted demanding the rollback of these rules.

title: Sanju Samson's T20 World Cup spot hangs by a thread
content: Team India faces a top-order selection dilemma for the T20 World Cup, with Sanju Samson's recent lean form raising concerns. Despite past investment, his struggles as an opener persist, while Ishan Kishan shines in his comeback. Experts urge patience, warning against disruptive team changes, but continued failures could force another tough call.

title: The Ajit Pawar story: Political journey of Maharashtra's longest-serving deputy CM
content: Maharashtra's longest-serving Deputy Chief Minister, Ajit Pawar, tragically passed away in a plane crash. A prominent figure in state politics, Pawar was known for his deep connection with the masses and his ability to navigate complex alliances. His political career, spanning from the cooperative sector to the highest echelons of power, was deeply rooted in his Baramati constituency.

title: Lost & Fined: More trouble for Jemimah Rodrigues as DC's playoff chances dwindle in WPL
content: Delhi Capitals captain Jemimah Rodrigues has been fined Rs 12 lakh for a slow over-rate following their narrow three-run loss to Gujarat Giants in the WPL. Despite the setback, Rodrigues praised her team's fighting spirit and remains optimistic about their playoff chances ahead of their crucial final league match.

title: Anna Kupp sparks debate wearing Seahawks coat against Rams in NFC showdown
content: Cooper Kupp’s NFC Championship appearance against his former Rams blended football and family into one powerful moment. Now with the Seahawks, the Super Bowl MVP faced his past while drawing strength from his wife Anna and their three sons. The matchup symbolized resilience, loyalty, and a fresh chapter driven by purpose.

title: Patrick Mahomes rehabs quietly as Brittany Mahomes ensures stability for their kids
content: Patrick Mahomes is enduring a demanding offseason as he recovers from an ACL and LCL tear, limiting his usual family routine. While he focuses on rehabilitation and a possible Week 1 return, Brittany Mahomes is creating joyful moments for their children, helping maintain normalcy as the Chiefs star patiently works through recovery.

title: Travis Kelce supports Taylor Swift amid legal troubles as wedding plans pause
content: Travis Kelce has become a steady source of support for Taylor Swift as she navigates emotional strain linked to ongoing legal troubles around her inner circle. While staying publicly silent, Swift has leaned on Kelce’s guidance to protect her peace, set boundaries, and address personal tensions directly, even as wedding plans remain on pause.

title: ‘Flying to Baramati, will talk tomorrow’: Attendant’s father recalls her last words
content: “Pappa, I am flying to Baramati tomorrow (Wednesday) with DCM Ajit Pawar. After dropping him, I will go to Nanded and will speak to you once I reach the hotel…” Shivkumar Mali said, recounting his last conversation with his daughter Pinky Mali, an attendant killed in the Baramati plane crash

title: Recycled ritual, replete with hollow promises: Congress slams Govt after President address in Parliament
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge said the Viksit Bharat slogan is repeated loudly, "yet it has no clear goals, timelines and measurable outcomes"

title: Petitioners submit 88% not issued notices in TN as objections phase ends on Jan 30, SC schedules urgent hearing on Jan 29
content: Senior advocate Kapil Sibal, representing the petitioners, suggests that the court should extend the directions issued in the January 19 order in the West Bengal SIR case to Tamil Nadu as well.

title: Ajit Pawar: Sharad Pawar’s shadow to Fadnavis’ ally, a look at his 40-year political journey
content: Rising from his uncle’s shadow to openly challenging his authority, Ajit Pawar emerged as Maharashtra’s most enduring Deputy Chief Minister

title: Export of marine products from Kerala dipped for second consecutive year in 2024-25: Economic Review
content: Tariff barriers, non-tariff barriers, including antibiotic rejection, biosecurity and sustainability issues, imposition of ban on wild-caught shrimps imported from India due to non-implementation of Turtle Excluder Device by the U.S. etc, are reasons for decrease in marine exports, according to the Economic Review

title: Lok Sabha pays tributes to Ajit Pawar, Khaleda Zia
content: Speaker Om Birla read out obituary references on Ajit Pawar, Zia, Shalini Patil, Bhanu Prakash Mirdha, Satyendra Nath Brohmo Chaudhury, Suresh Kalmadi and Kabindra Purkayastha

title: Leaders demand probe into Ajit Pawar’s death in plane crash
content: TMC supremo Mamata demands Supreme Court-monitored probe; Congress Chief Mallikarjun Kharge raises concern

title: Two arrested for inter-State car theft, vehicles worth ₹2.31 crore recovered by Bengaluru police
content: The case came to light following a complaint lodged at the Govindpura police station in Bengaluru on January 4 by a resident of K.G. Halli

title: 10 members of international drug racket arrested by Bengaluru police, narcotics worth ₹4 crore seized
content: The drugs were transported by mules who were offered ₹30,000 towards travel expenses, along with pocket money, and were allegedly assured a ₹2 lakh bonus upon successful delivery

title: Ajit Pawar (1959-2026)
content: Ajit Pawar’s sudden demise follows a transformative political journey, leaving Maharashtra grappling with the loss of a prominent leader

title: India, South Asia airlines will need nearly 3,300 new planes by 2044: Boeing
content: Single-aisle jets or the narrow-body planes will account for nearly 90% of these projected deliveries at 2,875 while wide-body aircraft will be at 395

title: Visibility was poor when plane carrying Ajit Pawar crashed: Aviation Minister Naidu
content: When ATC Baramati asked the pilot whether the runway was in sight, the response was negative, following which the aircraft executed a go-around

title: Man found dead after being hit by train in Kasaragod
content: Deceased identified as M. Nidheesh. Exact circumstances that led to his death are yet to be ascertained

title: Patrons question longer travel time on Nagercoil-Mangaluru Amrit Bharat Express, demand extension to Goa
content: Their other suggestion is that the common man’s premium train can serve more people if extended to Kanniyakumari in the south and Vasco/Subrahmanya Road in the north

title: Stalin credits late DMK leader M. Balakrishnan with party’s growth in Tiruchi
content: Speaking at the family wedding of former MLA B. Bharanikumar, Mr. Stalin said that the late Balakrishnan was closely associated with former Chief Ministers C.N. Annadurai, M. Karunanidhi, and DMK veteran Anbil K. Dharmalingam

title: Ex-SP MLA, others booked over row during idol immersion procession in U.P.'s Chandauli
content: Reacting to the action, the former MLA told PTI that the police case "was an attempt to suppress the voice of the Opposition."  He alleged that cases were being lodged against anyone who spoke against the BJP.

title: President Murmu's address reflects India's remarkable development journey in recent times: PM Modi
content: The prime minister said the emphasis on building a Viksit Bharat was perfectly captured, reflecting the shared aspiration of building a strong and self-reliant nation

title: Ajit Pawar would always be remembered for his dedication to public service: Pawan Kalyan
content: Maharashtra Deputy CM Ajit Pawar and four others were killed on January 28, after an aircraft carrying them crash landed in Baramati in Pune district

title: Special emphasis given for development of east, northeast: President Murmu
content: President Droupadi Murmu referred to the arrival of a Rajdhani Express train for the first time in the Mizoram capital, Aizawl, and the enthusiasm shown by the local people that "brought joy to the entire nation"

title: Yet another case of stray dog killings in Telangana, case booked in Nagarkurnool
content: A complaint alleged as many as 100 stray dogs were killed. Police recovered carcasses of some dogs so far.

title: Supreme Court appoints retired judge S.K. Kaul to mediate Vadakalai-Thenkalai dispute at Kancheepuram temple
content: The Devarajaswamy Temple is Vadakalai in character. A shrine dedicated to Sri Vedanta Desikar is located within the temple. Prohibiting hymns in his praise violates the Vadakalais’ fundamental rights,” said the petition challenging a Madras High Court judgment favouring Thenkalai.

title: Dates of Telangana Municipal Elections 2026, Ward Members’ oath administration
content: After the polling, counting of votes will be taken up on February 13 and the results would be announced soon after the conclusion of counting

title: Kerala economy records ‘strong’ 6.19% real growth in 2024-25, says Economic Review
content: Economic Review 2025 tabled in Kerala Assembly highlights the need for ‘resilient, innovative and forward-looking financial strategies’ to tackle prevailing fiscal challenges

title: Opposition will use all democratic means to demand restoration of MGNREGA: Congress
content: While the President's mention of the VB-G RAM G Act was welcomed by treasury benches by thumping of desks, Opposition members raised slogans demanding roll back of the law

title: In Pictures | Ajit Pawar's political journey
content: Ajit Pawar, a key Maharashtra politician, shaped the State’s politics for decades, influencing major party alliances and leadership roles

title: Health Ministry notifies amendments to New Drugs and Clinical Trials Rules, 2019
content: The move is to simplify regulatory processes, reduce approval time, and to enable faster conduct of clinical research in pharmaceutical sector

title: 2.5 crore people got free treatment last year under Ayushman Bharat health scheme: President Murmu
content: Addressing a joint sitting of Parliament, President Droupadi Murmu said that during the past almost one-and-a-half years, Vay Vandana cards have been issued to approximately one crore senior citizens

title: India-EU FTA to create new employment opportunities for youth: President Murmu
content: The President said India has further improved its record in keeping inflation under control and it is directly benefiting the poor and middle class

title: Delhi HC to hear NIA’s plea for death penalty for Yasin Malik on April 22
content: NIA counsel submitted that Yasin Mailk filed a lengthy reply to the agency's appeal, which even had content "not related" to the case, and the rejoinder was being vetted

title: Kerala Assembly: CPI(M) moves breach of privilege notice against Satheesan for ‘demeaning’ Education Minister
content: CPI(M) MLA V. Joy’s notice, moved under Rule 154 of Rules of Procedure of Kerala Legislative Assembly, stems from Satheesan’s allegedly ‘rude’ remarks about V. Sivankutty and LDF Cabinet at a Congress protest meeting in front of Secretariat

title: Govt committed to true social justice: President Murmu tells Parliament
content: In the third term of the government, President Murmu said, work is being done to further empower the poor, and social security benefits are available to nearly 95 crore citizens now.

title: When a Union Minister of State from Tamil Nadu died in a chopper crash in Arunachal Pradesh
content: ‘I will be at home tonight,’ N.V.N. Somu had told his wife, but only his coffin made it back in November 1997

title: Ajit Pawar’s death: CM Fadnavis, Dy CM Shinde and other leaders express deep condolences; three-day State mourning announced
content: Maharashtra leaders express deep condolences for Deputy CM Ajit Pawar’s tragic death in a plane crash, announcing State mourning

title: Supreme Court extends tenure of Gita Mittal Committee formed to provide ‘healing touch' in Manipur
content: A Bench headed by CJI Surya Kant said the former women judges' panel would continue to function till July 31, 2026

title: Union Budget 2026 needs to focus on long-term vision to make Indian economy more resilient: Raghuram Rajan
content: The former Governor of RBI said that earlier, India had five-year plans, but even then, the country's Budget was not well integrated with them

title: India comes out on top on this: Trump administration on India-EU FTA
content: U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said that it looks like the EU is doubling down on globalisation when the U.S. is trying to "fix some of the problems of globalisation in the US”

title: Supreme Court agrees to hear Air India crash early as NGO flags lack of response from govt, AAIB
content: The batch of petitions, includes one filed by 91-year-old Pushkar Raj Sabharwal, the father of Commander Sumeet Sabharwal, one of the pilots on the ill-fated aircraft

title: Kerala MLA Rahul Mamkootathil gets bail in third rape case
content: Court had earlier reserved its order on Palakkad MLA’s bail plea after prosecution raised doubts about authenticity of certain digital evidence. During hearing, the defence argued that the relationship with complainant was consensual

title: Ajit Pawar: Baramati plane crash abruptly ends the decades-long political career of influential NCP leader
content: Ajit Pawar entered the Maharashtra Assembly in 1991, went on to become the Baramati MLA for multiple terms, and served as the State’s Deputy Chief Minister on several occasions

title: Ajit Pawar plane crash: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan condoles death of Maharashtra Deputy CM
content: Pinarayi Vijayan posts on X: ‘His contribution to the public life and development of Maharashtra will be remembered’

title: Over 25 schools in Chandigarh receive bomb threat emails; students, staff evacuated
content: An FIR has been registered in the matter at Sector 17 police station, said the SSP. The SSP said that schools which did not get bomb threat emails are open

title: Air crash which killed Ajit Pawar to be probed, says Maharashtra Deputy CM Eknath Shinde
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others were killed after an aircraft carrying them crashed in Pune

title: Ajit Pawar’s death: President Murmu, PM Modi and other leaders offer condolences
content: President Droupadi Murmu, Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Home Minister Amit Shah and other leaders condole the demise of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar

title: Kerala Assembly honours Maharashtra Dy CM Ajit Pawar with a moment of silence after air crash death
content: After Question Hour ended, Speaker A.N. Shamseer informed the House about Pawar's death and asked everyone to observe a brief silence

title: Nagaland: Wildfire erupts in southern Dzukou Valley, over 30 trekkers evacuated
content: All trekking activities in the Dzukou Valley, from both the Jakhama and Viswema entry points, have been temporarily suspended

title: At least four Gurugram schools receive bomb threat emails; classes suspended for the day
content: No suspicious objects or explosive materials have been found during the search so far, the Gurugram Police said

title: Karnataka Assembly congratulates recipients of Padma award
content: On January 27, Speaker U.T. Khader read out a congratulatory message in the House appreciating their contributions in their respective fields

title: IndiGo extends cancellation of flights to Tbilisi, Almaty till Feb 11
content: The airline has extended the cancellation of these flights because of tensions that have escalated between Iran and the U.S.

title: PNB to expand digital, startup banking presence in Bengaluru
content: PNB is planning to open digital branches in major technology parks across Bengaluru, aimed at addressing the evolving banking needs of professionals, corporates, and digitally savvy customers

title: Indore water contamination: MP HC sets up probe panel, calls for urgent judicial scrutiny
content: The State government on January 27, 2026 told the HC that the deaths of 16 persons in Indore’s Bhagirathpura area were possibly linked to a month-long outbreak of vomiting and diarrhoea caused by contaminated drinking water

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026 updates: Govt succeeding in building a system free from corruption, says President Murmu
content: The Economic Survey of India is scheduled to be presented on January 29, followed by the Union Budget 2026-27, to be presented on February 1, 2026

title: India looking to deepen global aviation partnerships at Wings India 2026, says Civil Aviation Minister Rammohan Naidu
content: Union Civil Aviation Minister K. Rammohan Naidu said India wants to deepen its relationships with organisations and countries across the world, particularly in aviation

title: Private sleeper bus catches fire near Hosanagara in Karnataka
content: Three people, including the driver and conductor, suffered burn injuries, while a few others sustained minor injuries

title: Kadavanthra-Panampilly Nagar circular feeder bus service extended
content: Kochi Metro Rail Limited managing director Loknath Behera flagged off the extended service at a function held in Kasturba Nagar.

title: Avalanche hits J&K’s Sonamarg tourist resort; officials say no casualty
content: Officials said the avalanche hit Sonamarg resort in central Kashmir’s Ganderbal district at 10:12 p.m.

title: Telangana DGP commends Sarvejana Foundation’s road safety initiatives
content: He was speaking after releasing road safety stickers and a short awareness film titled Badram Naanna at the DGP office in Hyderabad

title: Tharoor stays silent on CPI(M) leanings but vows direct talks with Congress leaders
content: The Congress MP clarifies that his absence from the high-level Congress meeting in New Delhi was simply a matter of bad timing

title: Multi-Lane Free Flow tolling to be tested in pilot project on Bengaluru–Mysuru highway
content: The MLFF system replaces traditional toll booths with overhead gantries equipped with satellite-based GPS technology, high-performance RFID FASTag readers and Automated Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) cameras.

title: Three arrested, drugs worth ₹4 lakh seized in separate cases in Bengaluru
content: In another case, the Jalahalli police arrested a drug peddler and seized 31 gm of MDMA worth approximately ₹3 lakh

title: How a political and legal battle halted efforts to conserve Tiruvannamalai temple 25 years ago
content: More than two decades ago, the Archaeological Survey of India proposed to declare the Arunachaleswara temple a “monument of national importance.” The proposal, however, was shelved after a row fomented by vested interests

title: Capturing the cruelty of leprosy in a dark and merciless language
content: The anguish and alienation associated with leprosy have long made it a potent subject in literature, inspiring some of the modern writing in Tamil

title: Maharashtra, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu have highest number of vacancies under the NEET-PG 2025-26
content: “Prohibitive cost of education, lack of good teaching staff, infrastructure, patient load, and stipend deterrents,” experts said

title: Heavy police deployment to ensure peaceful municipal elections in Telangana
content: To instil confidence among voters, flag marches involving armed forces will be conducted in more than 1,000 sensitive and vulnerable locations across the State, the DGP said

title: Excise in Kochi steps up anti-drug drive with new intelligence wing
content: Two teams, comprising 22 officials, deployed to gather intelligence on suspected trafficking of narcotic items and other contraband; excise in talks with Narcotics Control Bureau to expand intelligence network

title: In a fresh attack, Rohini Acharya alleges RJD is on the brink of ruin
content: Few days back, she had criticised the members of her family for allegedly destroying a legacy, and claimed that outsiders are not needed for that.

title: A political dust storm over the Singareni coal mines
content: The Congress and the BRS are involved in mudslinging over the alleged irregularities in tenders for removal of overburden in the coal mines.

title: Stalin launches project for women’s safety, HPV vaccination initiative at global summit
content: Tamil Nadu Women Employment and Safety Project will promote sustainable and inclusive economic development through targeted interventions for employment, safety, and empowerment. The vaccination drive will begin in Ariyalur, Dharmapuri, Perambalur, and Tiruvannamalai districts

title: 'Insane ...': Patrick Mahomes leads reactions to Belichick missing first-ballot Hall of Fame nod
content: The sports world was abuzz on social media after news that the legendary coach wouldn't be a first ballot Hall of Famer broke.

title: Sources: Belichick not a 1st-ballot Hall of Famer
content: Bill Belichick, the eight-time Super Bowl-winning coach, will not be a first-ballot Hall of Famer, sources told ESPN.

title: Broncos fire OC Lombardi after falling short of SB
content: Broncos offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi was fired Tuesday along with wide receivers coach Keary Colbert and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch.

title: Djokovic, down 2 sets, advances when Musetti hurt
content: Novak Djokovic will play in his 13th Australian Open semifinal after his opponent, Lorenzo Musetti, retired from their match while leading the 24-time major champion 6-4, 6-3, 1-3.

title: Nebraska's 24-game win streak ends vs. Michigan
content: Nebraska's improbable run, the longest in Division I since the 2014-15 Kentucky team went 38-0, came to a halt against the No. 3 Wolverines.

title: Swiatek, Pegula echo Gauff: Players need privacy
content: Iga Swiatek and Jessica Pegula backed Coco Gauff's call for more privacy at tennis tournaments, saying that the seemingly limitless access to players is often unnecessary.

title: Champion Hoosiers draw OSU, U-M back-to-back
content: Indiana, the reigning national champion, will face off against Big Ten powers Ohio State and Michigan in back-to-back weeks next season.

title: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings
content: Spurs star Victor Wembanyama on Tuesday articulated his thoughts on a pair of fatal shootings by federal agents in Minneapolis, saying, "Every day I wake up and see the news and I'm horrified."

title: Rodman, Hayes viral celebration caps off U.S. rout
content: Trinity Rodman capped off the USWNT's 5-0 rout of Chile by coaxing coach Emma Hayes into a sideline dance, as a young American squad secured its fifth consecutive shutout Tuesday night.

title: 🏈 Connelly's top 100 games of 2025 CFB season
content: From CFP (and FCS playoff) classics to OT thrillers and what-the-heck moments, this season had it all.

title: Top 100 MLB prospects for 2026: This year's No. 1 is in a tier of his own
content: Where do stars of tomorrow such as Konnor Griffin and Kevin McGonigle land as we rank baseball's best young players?

title: Women's Bracketology: How a new metric will help (or hurt) bubble teams
content: Understanding wins above bubble helps explain why Virginia, which has a 37 NET ranking, is on the outside looking in.

title: The three key factors that helped the Avalanche turn into a juggernaut
content: Colorado is flirting with NHL records for team performance. We dive deep on the NHL's most dominant team.

title: Bobby Marks' NBA trade deadline guide: What to know about all 30 teams
content: What deals could kick-start the NBA trade deadline? Bobby Marks examines the players, picks and priorities you need to know for all 30 teams.

title: What went wrong for Coco Gauff at the Australian Open
content: Elina Svitolina was able to upset No. 3 Coco Gauff in less than an hour on Tuesday night. Here's how she did it.

title: Four offseason lessons from two unlikely Super Bowl teams: Savvy moves for the Seahawks, Patriots
content: It's easy to be skeptical about big free agency spending, midtier QB contracts and defensive-minded coaches. But the Seahawks and Patriots proved everyone wrong.

title: First look at Seahawks-Patriots: Early Super Bowl picks, big questions, key matchups
content: Ahead of the Feb. 8 showdown, we have predictions, matchup insight, looming questions and team breakdowns.

title: Sizing up Stafford vs. Maye for MVP: Which star quarterback should win the award?
content: It's a two-player race for NFL MVP. We made cases for quarterbacks Matthew Stafford and Drake Maye to win the award -- then our experts made their picks.

title: Inside Sean Payton's fourth-down Patriots-Broncos call
content: Behind the scenes with Denver Broncos coach Sean Payton, before and after his failed fourth-down decision.

title: The Premier League stars who could still move this transfer window
content: There is less than a week to go in the January transfer window. Here are the Premier League players who still need a move away this month.

title: What it's really like for a player switching clubs in the January transfer window
content: Former Man City defender reveals how the transfer window can be full of uncertainty, selfishness and betrayal.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi clubs eye PSG's Dembele amid contract issues
content: The Saudi Pro League is "laying the groundwork" for a move for PSG star Ousmane Dembele.Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: How Premier League clubs turned into corporations and replaced 'managers' with 'head coaches'
content: Premier League clubs are corporations that have outgrown the "manager" role that legendary Arsenal and Man United clubs once had. Why?

title: 2026 ESPN Fantasy Baseball draft guide: Rankings, tips, strategy, stats and more
content: All the rankings, projections, cheat sheets, strategy and analysis you need for the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

title: Quartet of shortstops leads top-10 prospects to consider for 2026
content: Eric Karabell outlines the prospects most likely to have an impact on the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

title: WWE 'Raw' results: Finn Balor attacks CM Punk, Bron Breakker returns
content: Andreas Hale breaks down all the action from the last episode of "Raw" before Saturday's Royal Rumble.

title: Best of Day 1 at the Senior Bowl: Which draft prospects turned the most heads on Tuesday?
content: Here are the top NFL draft risers from the first day of Senior Bowl practices, where the defensive line class stood out.

title: 'Bulldoze these guys': Alexander Volkanovski's vow after 2,996 days of waiting
content: By the time Alexander Volkanovski makes his Octagon walk on Sunday, it will be 2,996 days since he last fought in Sydney. A lot has changed since then, but a late-career lingering UFC narrative remains a constant.

title: Benny the Bull picks new number after Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey retirement
content: Benny had worn No. 1 since 1969. In honor of Rose's jersey retirement, the beloved mascot enters a new era.

title: Ranking this weekend's fights: From Lopez-Shakur to Zayas-Baraou
content: Nick Parkinson ranks the weekend's fights from best to worst and breaks down what's at stake in each matchup.

title: "Papa, I'm Flying With Ajit Pawar To Baramati": Crew's Last Call To Father
content: Ajit Pawar Death: The final phone conversation between flight attendant Pinky Mali and her father, Shivkumar Mali, has emerged following the Baramati plane crash that claimed the lives of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others.

title: After "Selfish Woman" Remark, Mulayam Singh's Son's U-Turn Pic With Wife
content: Days after a public declaration of his desire to divorce his wife, Aparna Bisht Yadav, Prateek Yadav, the younger son of Samajwadi Party founder Mulayam Singh Yadav, has shared a new post on Instagram with a contrasting message.

title: "Wow. This Is A New Kind Of Fraud": Supreme Court On Minority Certificate Plea
content: Flagging a new kind of "fraud," the Supreme Court on Wednesday pulled up the Haryana government over a petition filed by Nikhil Kumar Punia and Ekta Punia.

title: Dead Man, 62, Named Prime Accused In 26-Year-Old Mizoram Woman's Murder
content: A 62-year-old man, who died last month, has been named the prime accused in a murder case in Mizoram's Aizawl district.

title: Pramod Mahajan To Ajit Pawar: Deaths That Changed Maharashtra Politics
content: Ajit Pawar's death is the latest in a string of abrupt deaths that have blighted Maharashtra's politics for years. The last two decades witnessed three stalwarts-- Pramod Mahajan, Vilasrao Deshmukh and Gopinath Munde-- die tragically.

title: India Shows Solidarity With Israel, Slams Terror At Holocaust Memorial Event
content: India underlined the moral and strategic depth of its partnership with Israel as Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri used the occasion of International Holocaust Remembrance Day in New Delhi to link the lessons of history with present-day challenges.

title: "Why Should I Ground Fit Aircraft?" VSR Aviation Owner After Ajit Pawar's Death
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar was travelling in a Bombardier Learjet 45 - operated by VSR Aviation - when it crashed in an open field, killing all five on board minutes before landing at Baramati Airport in Maharashtra.

title: Euro Tops $1.20: Who Wins, Who Loses?
content: The euro has surged past $1.20 for the first time in more than four years, fuelled by Donald Trump's tariffladen presidency and a slide in the dollar.

title: After Toppling Sheikh Hasina, Young Bangladeshis Turn Back To Old Guard
content: Dhaka University student Sadman Mujtaba Rafid defied his parents and police to join protests that toppled former Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina, convinced the rallies were essential to ensure democracy prevailed over dynastic rule.

title: South Korea's Ex-First Lady Jailed For 20 Months For Taking Bribes
content: A South Korean judge handed the country's former first lady Kim Keon Hee 20 months in jail for accepting lavish gifts from a cult-like church, but acquitted her for alleged stock manipulation and other charges.

title: Ajit Pawar Plane Crash Live Updates: Ajit Pawar Dies In Plane Crash, Aviation Minister Says Probe Will Be Conducted In "Transparent" Manner
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and five other persons were killed after an aircraft carrying them crashed in Pune district on Wednesday morning.

title: Budget Session 2026 Live Updates: President Droupadi Murmu Addresses Joint Sitting
content: Budget Session 2026 Live Updates: President Droupadi Murmu is addressing a joint sitting of the Lok Sabha and Rajy Sabha On Wednesday.

title: Texas Governor Halts H-1B Hiring At State Colleges, Agencies
content: Texas Governor Greg Abbott ordered state agencies and public universities to immediately freeze new H-1B visa petitions, curtailing a programme that has also been overhauled by President Donald Trump.

title: OpenAI's Sam Altman Says 'ICE Is Going Too Far' After Minnesota Killings
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees in an internal message that ICE is "going too far" with its immigration crackdown, becoming the latest corporate executive to voice concerns.

title: Indonesia Landslide Deaths Rise To 34, Dozens Missing
content: The deathsl from a landslide in Indonesia have risen to 34 with dozens still missing, authorities said on Wednesday, days after the torrent of debris crashed through a mountain village.

title: Opinion: Blog | "I'll Be Chief Minister, You'll See": The Many Dreams Of Ajit Pawar
content: Ajit Pawar, unlike most other politicians who mask their pursuit of power with pious claims of 'public service', wore his ambition on his sleeve.

title: Bangladeshi Islamist Party's Pro-Hindu Pitch Amid Violence Against Minorities
content: In what is being seen as the strongest minority outreach by Bangladesh's radical Islamists, Jamaat-E-Islami leader Shafiqur Rahman has appealed to Hindus to vote for the party in the upcoming elections.

title: Will European Union Ban Social Media For Children In 2026?
content: As France moves one step closer to banning social media for children, the European Union is seriously considering whether it's time for the bloc to follow suit.

title: Video: Supriya Sule At Baramati After Ajit Pawar's Death, Breaks Down In Tears
content: Supriya Sule, along with Sunetra Pawar, reached Baramati on Wednesday afternoon, just hours after Ajit Pawar's plane crashed in the area early this morning after takeoff from Mumbai.

title: "In Politics, One Has To Pay Price For Candour": Raj Thackeray On Ajit Pawar
content: Ajit Pawar's death is a tragic blow for Maharashtra at a time when administration must rise over those in power, Maharashtra Navnirman Sena chief Raj Thackeray has said

title: UCLA's Bob Chesney: Coal miner, bartender, coach of the Bruins
content: new coach Bob Chesney has mined coal, slung Red Bull and vodkas behind a bar . he has worked every on-field job from strength coach to special teams coach . "he's the kind of guy I want to get in the foxhole with," athletic director says .

title: MMA divisional rankings: 10 ranked fighters at UFC 324 -- and only one moved

title: 2026 Big Ten college football: Schedules for all 18 conference teams

title: MLB's top five breakout teams for 2026: A healthier Braves squad? A bounce-back in Baltimore?
content: a breakout team is a club that wins at least 10 more games than what would be expected by its established level of play . we'll use wins per 162 games for the previous two seasons, while giving double weight to the most recent season . last season, the highest baseline win level was the Los Angeles Dodgers .

title: Wetzel: Let football be football. And let it snow.
